name: Bartender VR Simulator
description: Developed in cooperation with a six-time Bartending World Champion, Tomek Malek, Bartender VR Simulator offers you a unique combination of a simulator, bartending course and incredible immersive VR game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i7 equivalent or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
